Text:
This is okay. Video quality is about like a VHS tape. It has an okay selection of songs. The audio quality is mediocre.

I didnt care for the camera angles... I couldnt really feel like I was watching them live... like you can for the Led Zeppelin DVD or other bob marley stuff etc.

thanks a lot for this man! highly appreciated!
peace
